title: A Present from the True Culprit

infobox.Title:: A Present from the True Culprit
infobox.Japanese title:: 真犯人からの届け物  (Shinhan'nin kara no Todokemono)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Azusa Enomoto  Ran Mouri  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Juzo Megure  Miwako Sato  Sugihito Enomoto  Detective Okumura  Detective Saitoh  Detective Horita  Detective Nakamura  Unnamed officer

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Mikiko Enomoto as Azusa Enomoto  Hiroyuki Shibamoto as Sugihito Enomoto  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Tohru Furusawa as Toji Kawase  Eiji Yanazawa as Deliveryman

sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are at their usual diner but learn that their waitress' brother is a suspect in a murder.

The waitress, Azusa Enomoto, is interrogated by the authorities about her older brother, Sugihito Enomoto. When a package containing cookies is delivered to Azusa, she leaves to go shopping while Takagi accompanies her. Takagi returns revealing Azusa escaped from him and is deduced to be meeting her brother.
sections.People:
- 28 years old
- Azusa's older brother
- Deceased (gunshot?)
- Securities trader
- 28 years old
- Securities company employee
- Delivered the package containing suspicious contents
